trans-unit.source: Represents the mouse device to a specific thread.
trans-unit.target: Representerer musen enheten på en bestemt tråd.

trans-unit.source: The Mouse class provides mouse related events, methods and, properties which provide information regarding the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Klassen musen gir musen relatert hendelser, metoder og egenskaper som gir informasjon om tilstanden for musen.

trans-unit.source: Each event that Mouse defines as an attached event is also re-exposed by the base element classes <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> as a new routed event.
trans-unit.target: Hver hendelse musen definerer som en vedlagte hendelse utløses også på nytt i basistabellen elementet klassene <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>og <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>som en ny rutet hendelse.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Generally, it is more convenient to handle mouse events for an application on <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>, rather than using the Mouse events.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis, er det enklere å håndtere musen for en applikasjon på <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>og <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>, i stedet hendelsene musen.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [inndataene oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The static members of the Mouse class delegate to the primary <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice> of the calling thread's input manager.
trans-unit.target: De statiske medlemmene av musen klassen delegere til primært <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice>av kall trådens inndata manager.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice>

trans-unit.source: The event handler.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandling.

trans-unit.source: Captures mouse input to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Registrerer musen inndata til det angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders.
trans-unit.target: Når et element fanger musen, mottar musen inndataene hvorvidt markøren er innenfor grensene.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode> is not specified, the default <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode> is <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>ikke er angitt, standard <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>er <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>

trans-unit.source: To release mouse capture, call Capture passing `null` as the element to capture.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil frigjøre musen capture kall Capture sending `null` som elementet til capture.

trans-unit.source: If the mouse is captured when a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> event is raised and the input is not going to the element underneath the mouse, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement> are raised first.
trans-unit.target: Hvis musen fanges når en <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>eller <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>denne hendelsen oppstår og inndataene er ikke skal elementet under musen, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement>og <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement>aktiveres først.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: This enables the captured element a chance to release capture before the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> events are routed.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det mulig for elementet opphentede mulighet til å frigjøre capture før den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>og <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>hendelser skal rutes.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: The element to capture the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Elementet til å ta musen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element was able to capture the mouse; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis elementet kunne capture musen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Captures mouse input to the specified element using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Registrerer musen inndata til det angitte elementet ved hjelp av den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether the cursor is within its borders.
trans-unit.target: Når et element fanger musen, mottar musen inndata om markøren er innenfor grensene.

trans-unit.source: To release mouse capture, call <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.Capture%2A> passing `null` as the element to capture.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil frigjøre musen capture, kan du kalle <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.Capture%2A>Kast `null` som elementet til capture.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.Capture%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the mouse is captured when a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> event is raised and the input is not going to the element underneath the mouse, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement> are raised first.
trans-unit.target: Hvis musen fanges når en <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>eller <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>denne hendelsen oppstår og inndataene er ikke skal elementet under musen, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement>og <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement>aktiveres først.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: This enables the captured element a chance to release capture before the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> events are routed.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det mulig for elementet opphentede mulighet til å frigjøre capture før den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>og <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>hendelser skal rutes.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: The element to capture the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Elementet til å ta musen.

trans-unit.source: The capture policy to use.
trans-unit.target: Innhenting av policyen for å bruke.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element was able to capture the mouse; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis elementet kunne capture musen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that has captured the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Henter elementet som har fanget opp musen.

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders.
trans-unit.target: Når et element fanger musen, mottar musen inndataene hvorvidt markøren er innenfor grensene.

trans-unit.source: The mouse is typically captured in this manner only during drag-and-drop operations, and retains capture until the drop action of the drag-and-drop operation occurs.
trans-unit.target: Musen vanligvis er registrert på denne måten bare under dra og slipp-operasjoner, og beholder capture til handlingen Slett for dra og slipp forekommer.

trans-unit.source: The element captured by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Elementet som hentes av musen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element the mouse pointer is directly over.
trans-unit.target: Henter elementet musepekeren holdes over direkte.

trans-unit.source: Controls can be composed of multiple elements.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller kan bestå av flere elementer.

trans-unit.source: DirectlyOver reports the specific element in the composite control the mouse pointer is over and not the control itself.
trans-unit.target: DirectlyOver rapporter bestemte elementet i den sammensatte kontrollen musepekeren holdes over og ikke selve kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For example, depending on which part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> the pointer is over, the DirectlyOver property could report the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property or the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ButtonChrome>.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel avhengig av hvilken del av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>pekeren er over, egenskapen DirectlyOver kan rapportere den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>egenskapen eller <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ButtonChrome>.</xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ButtonChrome> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsMouseOver%2A> property on <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> to determine whether the mouse is over an element, which includes its visual child elements or control compositing elements.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsMouseOver%2A>egenskap i <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>og <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>å finne ut om musen er over et element som inneholder de visuelle underordnede elementene eller kontrollere sammensetting elementer.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsMouseOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an element has mouse capture, the mouse pointer is considered directly over the element regardless of the where the mouse pointer is.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et element har musen capture, regnes musepekeren direkte over elementet uansett hvor musepekeren er.

trans-unit.source: The element the mouse pointer is over.
trans-unit.target: Elementet musepekeren holdes over.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves up to 64 previous coordinates of the mouse pointer since the last mouse move event.
trans-unit.target: Henter opptil 64 tidligere koordinatene til musepekeren siden siste museklikk flytte hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The elements `points` are in relation to.
trans-unit.target: Elementene `points` er i forhold til.

trans-unit.source: An array of objects.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av objekter.

trans-unit.source: The number of points returned.
trans-unit.target: Antallet punkt returnert.

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the mouse relative to a specified element.
trans-unit.target: Henter posisjon for musen i forhold til et angitt element.

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse pointer is calculated relative to the specified element with the upper-left corner of element being the point of origin, 0,0.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av musepekeren beregnet i forhold til det angitte elementet med øvre venstre hjørne av elementet som nullpunktet, 0,0.

trans-unit.source: During drag-and-drop operations, the position of the mouse cannot be reliably determined through GetPosition.
trans-unit.target: Under dra og slipp operasjoner kan ikke posisjon for musen fastslås en pålitelig måte via GetPosition.

trans-unit.source: This is because control of the mouse (possibly including capture) is held by the originating element of the drag until the drop is completed, with much of the behavior controlled by underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] calls.
trans-unit.target: Dette er fordi kontroll over musen (inkludert kanskje capture) er i bruk av det opprinnelige elementet i dra til slettingen er fullført med mye virkemåten kontrolleres av underliggende [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] kall.

trans-unit.source: Try the following approaches instead: - Call the <xref:System.Windows.DragEventArgs.GetPosition%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.DragEventArgs> that is passed to the drag events (<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragEnter>, <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragOver>, <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragLeave>).
trans-unit.target: Prøv følgende fremgangsmåter i stedet:-kall i <xref:System.Windows.DragEventArgs.GetPosition%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Windows.DragEventArgs>som er sendt til hendelsene dra (<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragEnter>, <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragOver>, <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragLeave>).</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragLeave> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragOver> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragEnter> </xref:System.Windows.DragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.DragEventArgs.GetPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Call [GetCursorPos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/winui/winui/windowsuserinterface/resources/cursors/cursorreference/cursorfunctions/getcursorpos.asp), using P/Invoke.
trans-unit.target: -Kall [GetCursorPos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/winui/winui/windowsuserinterface/resources/cursors/cursorreference/cursorfunctions/getcursorpos.asp), ved hjelp av P/Invoke.

trans-unit.source: The coordinate space in which to calculate the position of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Koordinatsystem der du vil beregne posisjon for musen.

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse relative to the parameter relativeTo.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av musen i forhold til parameteren relativeTo .

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture>koblet denne hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture>

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered, and the result is stored as a field on the class that registers the routed event.
trans-unit.target: Distribuerte hendelsen identifikatorer opprettes når distribuert hendelser er registrert, og resultatet lagres som et felt i klassen som registrerer rutet hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and a utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: Disse identifikatorene inneholder et identifiserende navn, Eiertype, Hendelsesbehandlingstypen, rutingstrategi og en metode for verktøyet for å legge til eiere for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: You often use these identifiers as parameters to event system methods, to identify a particular routed event.
trans-unit.target: Du bruker ofte disse identifikatorene som parametere for hendelsen system metoder for å finne en bestemt rutet hendelse.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the left button of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Får statusen for den venstre knappen av musen.

trans-unit.source: The state of the left mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Tilstanden til venstre museknappen.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture> attached event.

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered, and the result is stored as a field on the class that registers the routed event.
trans-unit.target: Distribuerte hendelsen identifikatorer opprettes når distribuert hendelser er registrert, og resultatet lagres som et felt i klassen som registrerer rutet hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and a utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: Disse identifikatorene inneholder et identifiserende navn, Eiertype, Hendelsesbehandlingstypen, rutingstrategi og en metode for verktøyet for å legge til eiere for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: You often use these identifiers as parameters to event system methods, to identify a particular routed event.
trans-unit.target: Du bruker ofte disse identifikatorene som parametere for hendelsen system metoder for å finne en bestemt rutet hendelse.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Represents the number of units the mouse wheel is rotated to scroll one line.
trans-unit.target: Representerer hvor mange enheter musehjulet roteres å rulle én linje.

trans-unit.source: In the current [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], the value of this field is 120.
trans-unit.target: I gjeldende [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], verdien for dette feltet er 120.

trans-unit.source: The intention of the field exposure is to allow for vendors to build finer-resolution mouse wheels in the future, that perhaps would include a freely rotating wheel without notches.
trans-unit.target: Hensikten til feltet eksponering er å tillate for leverandører for å bygge bedre oppløsning musen hjul i fremtiden som kanskje omfatter fritt rotering hjul uten hakk.

trans-unit.source: The expectation is that such a device would send more messages per rotation, but with a smaller value in each message.
trans-unit.target: Forventningen er at slike enheter vil sende flere meldinger per rotasjon, men med en lavere verdi i alle meldinger.

trans-unit.source: To support this possibility, you should either add the incoming delta values until the MouseWheelDeltaForOneLine amount is reached (so for a delta-rotation you get the same response), or scroll partial lines in response to the more frequent messages.
trans-unit.target: For å støtte denne muligheten, må enten legger du til innkommende delta verdiene før hvor MouseWheelDeltaForOneLine er nådd (slik at du hente det samme svaret for delta-rotasjon), eller rulle delvis linjer som svar på hyppigere meldinger.

trans-unit.source: You could also choose your own scroll granularity and accumulate deltas of your own choosing until that delta is reached, or perhaps reference user-controllable system parameters for mouse sensitivity and extrapolate these to mouse wheel delta thresholds.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også velge din egen rullefeltet tetthet og samles opp deltas av eget valg før den delta er nådd, eller kanskje referere til brukeren kontrollert systemparametere for musen følsomhet og Ekstrapoler disse til musen hjulet delta terskelverdier.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cursor for the entire application.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir markør for hele programmet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor> that OverrideCursor is set to will be applied to the whole application.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>som OverrideCursor vil gjelde for hele programmet.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>

trans-unit.source: To clear the override <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>, set OverrideCursor to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Slik fjerner overstyringen <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>, WantDestinationQueue OverrideCursor `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>

trans-unit.source: Setting OverrideCursor to <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursors.None%2A> will force the mouse cursor not to be displayed, but mouse events are still processed.
trans-unit.target: Angi OverrideCursor til <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursors.None%2A>vil tvinge pekeren ikke som skal vises, men musen hendelser behandles fremdeles.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursors.None%2A>

trans-unit.source: The override cursor or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the OverrideCursor is not set.
trans-unit.target: Override markøren eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis OverrideCursor ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: The event handler.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandling.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the right button.
trans-unit.target: Får statusen for den høyre knappen.

trans-unit.source: The state of the right mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Statusen for Høyreklikk.

trans-unit.source: Sets the mouse pointer to the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Cursor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir pekeren til den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Cursor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The cursor being set does not apply to any particular element, but rather it applies to the whole application.
trans-unit.target: Markøren angis gjelder ikke for en bestemt element, men i stedet den gjelder hele programmet.

trans-unit.source: So, if after setting the cursor the mouse pointer moves over an object which sets the cursor, the cursor will be changed again.
trans-unit.target: Dette er tilfellet, hvis etter at markøren flytter pekeren over et objekt som angir markøren, markøren blir endret på nytt.

trans-unit.source: To force the mouse pointer to a specific <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor> and to force this <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor> on all elements, set the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.OverrideCursor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Tvinge pekeren til en bestemt <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>og for å fremtvinge dette <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>for alle elementer, angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.OverrideCursor%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.OverrideCursor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>

trans-unit.source: To set the cursor on a specific element, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Cursor%2A> property on either <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: For å angi markøren på et spesifikt element, bruker du <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Cursor%2A>egenskapen på enten <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>eller <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Cursor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the base elements, see the [Base Elements Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om base elementene i [Base oversikt over elementer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The cursor to set the mouse pointer to.
trans-unit.target: Markøren skal angis for pekeren.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the cursor was set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, hvis pekeren er angitt; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Forces the mouse to resynchronize.
trans-unit.target: Tvinger musen for å synkronisere på nytt.

trans-unit.source: Forces the mouse cursor to be updated.
trans-unit.target: Tvinger pekeren oppdateres.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the first extended button.
trans-unit.target: Får statusen for den første utvidede knappen.

trans-unit.source: The state of the first extended mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Statusen for den første utvidede museknappen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the second extended button.
trans-unit.target: Får statusen for den andre utvidede knappen.

trans-unit.source: The state of the second extended mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Tilstanden til andre utvidede museknappen.
